dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset from the Persian Registry Of cardio Vascular disease (PROVE) focusing on patients hospitalized with decompensated or acute heart failure, including data collected before hospitalization, during hospitalization, and at discharge, with follow-up data at 3, 6, and 12 months.
dcterms:title: Persian Registry Of cardio Vascular disease (PROVE)
